DIA_Riordian_SQ121_Cutscene_03_01: Let's wait until Lokvar is asleep. In the meantime, I'll tell you a little about transcribing the scrolls. Here, this is my manual.
DIA_Riordian_SQ121_Cutscene_03_02: ...In summary, to make a new scroll, you need blank parchment and the finished scroll you want to ultimately make.
DIA_Riordian_SQ121_Cutscene_03_03: Depending on how powerful is the spell it contains, you'll need either powdered ore or pure nuggets of it.
DIA_Riordian_SQ121_Cutscene_03_04: You sit down at the table and redraw everything from one scroll to another using ore.
DIA_Riordian_SQ121_Cutscene_03_05: Okay, Lokvar is probably asleep by now.
DIA_Riordian_SQ121_Cutscene_03_06: To be sure, stand in the threshold and use this spell on him. It's better not to get too close to him, because he might hear you.
